title: Updated Kitchen & Bathroom in 1 Bedroom by Lake Merritt AVL 9/1 370G
posting_body: 370 Staten Ave | Apt  G | Oakland, CA 94610
Schedule a tour TODAY with a Kasa Rep, or schedule a flexible self-access showing!
A cozy 15-unit building, located in a quiet neighborhood, an easy walk to Lake Merritt, Whole Foods, BART, and downtown Oakland.
This building has brightly-lit corridors, laundry room with new machines, and secure underground parking.

Apartments feature hardwood and tile floors, renovated kitchen with granite countertops, new windows, renovated bathrooms, extra insulation for sound and temperature control, energy-efficient lighting.
Security and safety features include new video surveillance system, enhanced exterior security lighting, and a centrally-monitored fire alarm.
Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)
Pet: $75 added to the base month per pet
Water and garbage are flat fees paid in addition to the base rent.
Attached garage parking is available for an additional $150/month.
Smoking is not permitted on the premises.
